[#TidyTuesday](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday) is a weekly data project aimed at the R ecosystem, aimed at developing skills in the tidyverse ecosystem. The [Tidier.jl](https://github.com/kdpsingh/Tidier.jl) implementation aims to bring the tidyverse ecosystem to Julia!

I'll be processing and visualising some of the #TidyTuesday data sets in Julia here!
